content: {"name": "Virginia SNAP Application", "alternate_name": "", "description": "\nThe easiest way to apply for SNAP is online at myDHR: https://www.commonhelp.virginia.gov/access/.\nYou will be asked to submit your supporting documents on the same site. In most cases, you will then be asked to complete an in-person interview. Waivers are given to people unable to go in-person.
